full_text: I’m a huge huge fan of No Code and the potential it brings ti SO MANY other people https://t.co/KUc60OSpEv
What’s he verified for? Spokesman for “Talking Out of My Ass” magazine? https://t.co/4yUvHASaFK

My genuine first reaction to someone who’s done very well or accomplished a huge feat is joy for that person. I understand jealousy and the negative side of the emotional spectrum but it just doesn’t seem worth it. Celebrate others wins and let them celebrate yours
